Interface JsonUser

public interface JsonUser
Interface representing the JSON User API

  • Method Details

    • login

      @POST("users/login") retrofit2.Call<Login> login(@Body Login login)
      Sends a login request
      Parameters:
      login - the Login object containing login information
      Returns:
      a Call object containing a Login object

    • user

      @POST("users/sing-up") retrofit2.Call<Register> user(@Body Register user)
      Sends a user request
      Parameters:
      user - the Register object containing registration information
      Returns:
      a Call object containing a Register object

    • resetPassword

      @PUT("users/password-reset") retrofit2.Call<Register> resetPassword(@Body Register user)
      Sends a password reset request
      Parameters:
      user - the Register object containing password reset information
      Returns:
      a Call object containing a Register object

    • points

      @PUT("users/users-level/{collectionName}") retrofit2.Call<UserLVL> points(@Path("collectionName") String collectionName, @Body UserLVL userLVL)
      Sends a points request to update the user's level
      Parameters:
      collectionName - the name of the collection
      userLVL - the UserLVL object containing level information
      Returns:
      a Call object containing a UserLVL object

    • getUserLVL

      @GET("users/users-level") retrofit2.Call<UserLVL> getUserLVL()
      Retrieves the user's level
      Returns:
      a Call object containing a UserLVL object
